Longboxed Factory Module¶

longboxed.factory¶

longboxed factory module

class longboxed.factory.LogOnlyLevel(level)[source]¶

Filter function. Used in a logging json configuration file to allow a handler to log only its own specific log level.

longboxed.factory.create_app(package_name, package_path, settings_override=None, debug_override=None, register_security_blueprint=True)[source]¶

Returns a Flask application instance configured with common functionality for the Longboxed platform.

Parameters:
  • package_name – application package name
  • package_path – application package path
  • settings_override – a dictionary of settings to override
  • debug_overide – Bool value that overrides the debug settings
longboxed.factory.create_celery_app(app=None)[source]¶

Factory method that to place a Celery instance in the context of a Flask application

Parameters:app – Flask application instance
longboxed.factory.setup_logging(default_path='longboxed/logging.json', default_level=20, env_key='LOG_CFG')[source]¶

Setup logging configuration

Parameters:
  • default_path – Path to json log configuration file
  • default_level – Level to set the logger at. Default to INFO level
